channel.title: Pages on Portfolio website of Daniel Zeiner
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Portfolio website of Daniel Zeiner

item.title: Alcohol consumption
item.description: Alcohol all around the world - where do people drink the most alcohol? While some people might argue that drinking alcohol can provide several health benefits, others believe that you should never drink at all. Regardless of this discussion, where do people drink the most alcohol? And how does this differ by alcohol type. The following visualizations provide answers on regional trends for alcohol preference:

item.title: About me
item.description: I’m an Financial Analysis (MFA) student at London Business School (2021). I have done my undergrad at the Vienna University of Business and Economics and due to my passion to mathematics, I also completed nearly half of the studies in Financial Mathematics besides my Business degree. I always was really keen to learn as much new things as possible & therefore constantly try to widen my horizon. LBS perfectly supports me with this objective, providing an environment with students from all over the world and first class lecturers.
